participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Caring and optimistic, always encouraging others to pursue their dreams.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my daughter is a child prodigy. i am a doctor. my favorite movie is friday.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Rebellious yet introspective, he often reflects on his choices and seeks redemption.
participant_2.background: i feel old. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i'll be released in about a month. i am here for shoplifting.

content.text: Nice to see you! i like to watch movies. i love it.
